name: Hrishita Lala
text: I was completely absorbed by every frame of it. The chemistry between the actors was palpable. I was left in awe of the sheer brilliance of it all.

name: Dhanush Chaudhari
text: The movie was a testament to the power of cinema.

name: Rati Dani
text: I've already recommended it to all my friends. The movie was a true joy to watch.
